Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: cumulative debt valuation adjustment net of tax attributable to parent
Additional Paid-in Capital: adjustments to additional paid in capital reallocation of minority interest
Treasury Stock: treasury stock value acquired cost method and employee tax withholdings

Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income loss derivatives qualifying as hedges net of tax
Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax portion attributable to parent
Other OCI: other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income loss net of tax excluding portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: available for sale securities change in net unrealized holding gain loss net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect of new accounting principle in periods of adoption

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value acquisitions
stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: stock issued during period value share based compensation
stock issued during period value share based compensation net of tax

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period value
__unmapped__: increase decrease in non controlling interest from consolidation
minority interest change in redemption value
minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
minority interest increase from stock issuance
net income loss attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest
noncontrolling interest reclassification to redeemable noncontrolling interest
nonredeemable noncontrolling interest attributable from net income loss
nonredeemable noncontrolling interest period increase decrease
other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
